title: What will the new Freljord vanguard be?
body: So I was bored and decided to make this to see what people think of the future champ. My opinion is that it will be one of the frozen watchers,and that would be great for the development of their lore,but I would love to hear some oter speculations

replies.body:
I just want to know if it is another boring viking like character from Freljord or not? I'm tired of human like characters seen in last releases.

Kayn, Xayah, Rakan, Camille in a row. It is just annoying.
But is is it a magical horn?

Overall I doubt it is a character that we have ever seen or heard of.
I mean the horn doesn't fit a watcher,so a watcher seems rather unlikely(which is a shame) and I kinda doubt that it is greyor,as that would feel rather underwhelming.

I hope it's not Gregor. He's a character that has been in the game for a while so adding him as a champion would stupid. I could see it if he was fresh as a small teaser but being an old character, it's unlikely that he is the new champion.
I doubt that it's a watcher. What do watchers have to do with warhorns?
I bet it's even a hunter, a warlord or the dwarf from Howling Abyss (the ghost merchant whatever)

Doran would make an amazing champion. A master blacksmith who has already played a major role in many champion's lore. He would be self sufficient like the teaser said and "heating up" would make sense. If not the horn looks somewhat like Olaf's clan. I've been wanting more information on Olaf so that would be interesting.
If this discussion blows up, someone reply to me so I get the notification. I'm curious as well.

It's gonna be a BlackSmith, I tell you ;) 

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/xuGbZzpf-next-champion-is-a-blacksmith-i-called-it-first-p

It's probably Gregor, the blue side ARAM shopkeeper.  That's his war-horn in the blog.
http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Howling_Abyss

I have no idea what the kit could be, besides him probably having a war-horn engage for his allies somewhere in his hit.
